_source.short_desc: The Orders, Inventory, and All-Things-Operations Platform for Ecommerce Merchants.
_source.long_desc: For ecommerce brands and marketplace sellers, Skubana provides unrivaled order, inventory, purchasing, and shipping capabilities into one powerful cloud solution.  If you sell on Shopify, Amazon, Big Commerce, and/or through big-box retailers, Skubana will bring everything you need into one place.
_source.target_audience: Ecommerce brands that sell on multiple channels from multiple warehouses and marketplace sellers who need powerful inventory features.

category_features.name: Backorder Management
category_features.definition: Management of order that cannot be filled when presented, and for which the customer is prepared to wait for some time

category_features.name: Cataloging/Categorization
category_features.definition: Create and manage digital catalog of products/services with their details, specification, and price

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Order Entry
category_features.definition: Enter, store, and transmit orders tests and other services, while the system checks for errors and transmits orders electronically

category_features.name: Order Fulfillment
category_features.definition: Process of taking, organizing, tracking and fulfilling purchase requests for a company's products or services

category_features.name: Order Tracking
category_features.definition: Track order status throughout the fulfillment process

category_features.name: Recurring Orders
category_features.definition: Managing orders that a customer purchases repeatedly and regularly

category_features.name: Returns Management
category_features.definition: Track and facilitate refunds/returns of products sold

category_features.name: Shipping Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track orders being sent and delivered to customers

category_features.name: Special Order Management
category_features.definition: A special order is an extra order or an order for an item specially requested by a customer

category_features.name: Barcoding/RFID
category_features.definition: Identify and track items using barcode tags or RFID (radio-frequency identification) tags that contain electronically-stored data

category_features.name: Check-in/Check-out
category_features.definition: Track the status of assets and whether they're checked in or out

category_features.name: Cost Tracking
category_features.definition: Record and monitor cost related information of assets (i.e. budget for assets, equipment costs, revenues, etc.)

category_features.name: Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions based on past and present data/trends

category_features.name: Inventory Optimization
category_features.definition: Balance and streamline inventory stock to meet customer service and revenue goals

category_features.name: Inventory Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor the movement and quantities of inventory items

category_features.name: Item Management
category_features.definition: Collect, organize, and track inventory/product data including item numbers, descriptions, etc.

category_features.name: Reorder Management
category_features.definition: Purchase and replenish product stock based on inventory levels and needs

category_features.name: SKU/UPC Codes
category_features.definition: Internal and external product tracking codes

category_features.name: Serial Number Tracking
category_features.definition: Allows users to assign specific serial numbers to products and track them

category_features.name: Supplier Management
category_features.definition: Manage various aspects of the relationship with suppliers (e.g. interactions, history)

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions based on past and present data/trends

category_features.name: Inventory Optimization
category_features.definition: Balance and streamline inventory stock to meet customer service and revenue goals

category_features.name: Kitting
category_features.definition: Group and package individual but related items as one package set

category_features.name: Manufacturing Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Software specialized for manufacturers to track work orders, bills of materials, and manufacture orders to help streamline operations

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Management
category_features.definition: Organize and maintain inventory levels across all channels (i.e. retail store, warehouse, etc.) based on demand and channel performance

category_features.name: Product Identification
category_features.definition: Ability to link barcodes or serial numbers with specific items for identification

category_features.name: Reorder Management
category_features.definition: Purchase and replenish product stock based on inventory levels and needs

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Retail Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Software specialized for retailers (i.e. business that sell consumer goods) to maintain adequate levels of product stock

category_features.name: Supplier Management
category_features.definition: Manage various aspects of the relationship with suppliers (e.g. interactions, history)

category_features.name: Warehouse Management
category_features.definition: Software specialized for managing warehouses and tracking where inventory is located within the warehouses

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: monday.com is a cloud Work OS, where teams run their projects and everyday work, whether they are in the office, home or on-the-go.
related_products.features: monday.com's CRM software will help you easily track all your orders, from initial acceptance to the shipment of the finished goods. With colorful views, you'll always know where all your orders stand and what needs to be done. Control every stage of your supply chain, track your orders' progress, delivery times, pipelines, or anything else using our Reports & Dashboards, no coding necessary.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite order management automates order management, returns, and exchanges, providing a flawless, flexible fulfillment strategy.
related_products.features: NetSuite order management enables a buy anywhere, fulfill anywhere, return anywhere experience. Ensure efficient order management processes across all channels and fulfillment options throughout the order lifecycle, allowing businesses to deliver on customer expectations and drive profits. Automate the end-to-end order lifecycle, including order capture and validation, order release, shipment confirmation, customer communications, and settlement.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite order management automates order management, returns, and exchanges, providing a flawless, flexible fulfillment strategy.
related_products.features: NetSuite order management enables a buy anywhere, fulfill anywhere, return anywhere experience. Ensure efficient order management processes across all channels and fulfillment options throughout the order lifecycle, allowing businesses to deliver on customer expectations and drive profits. Automate the end-to-end order lifecycle, including order capture and validation, order release, shipment confirmation, customer communications, and settlement.

related_products.short_desc: ShipStation makes it easy to manage all your orders from one platform with direct integrations to over 100 of the top-selling channels.
related_products.features: ShipStation Order Management software helps you organize your eCommerce orders easily and effectively. ShipStation provides several ways to manage all of your online orders and automate many tasks associated with order fulfillment. Gain complete control and insight into all of your orders at every stage of the shipping process from all of your different selling channels. Save time by automatically applying actions to orders based on the criteria you set.

related_products.short_desc: Deliver by design - at every stage of e-commerce complexity. Start shipping with Shippo, free.
related_products.features: Ecommerce is complex. Shipping doesn't have to be. Shippo connects you with the best rates at the most carriers using a solution integrated with your business and experienced support at every stage so you can grow into the future. Manage shipping for all of your sales channels and get access to exclusive discounts from USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL + 80 more, automated workflows, detailed tracking and notifications, seamless returns, international customs declarations, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Fishbowl Manufacturing and Inventory Management is a complete order management solution for manufacturers, distributors, & wholesalers.
related_products.features: Fishbowl's order management solution is designed to help you automate your ordering process, reduce costs and maximize profitability. Our real-time data and inventory management capabilities give you the information you need to make quick decisions while maximizing efficiency, while our work automation tools automate your routine tasks so you can focus on what really matters-growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Cin7 is a highly configurable inventory management, and order management solution with best-in-class built-in EDI and 700 integrations.
related_products.features: Cin7 is a highly configurable inventory management and order management solution with built-in EDI and integrations to all the popular eCommerce platforms, marketplaces, and 3PLs. It's best-in-class for all combinations of B2B and D2C sales channels, warehouses, shipping, and fulfillment. Cin7 provides exceptional automations, workflows, reports, and analysis to enable brands, retailers, and wholesalers to operate efficiently as they scale and efficiently match demand to supply.

similar_products.short_desc: Fishbowl Manufacturing and Inventory Management is a complete order management solution for manufacturers, distributors, & wholesalers.
similar_products.features: Fishbowl's order management solution is designed to help you automate your ordering process, reduce costs and maximize profitability. Our real-time data and inventory management capabilities give you the information you need to make quick decisions while maximizing efficiency, while our work automation tools automate your routine tasks so you can focus on what really matters-growing your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Kibo is the world's leading order management system that is made for scale and adapts to your business needs.
similar_products.features: Kibo is the world's leading multi-tenant SaaS platform for distributed order management, enabling retailers and branded manufacturers to make better inventory decisions at scale. Kibo order management system is architected for flexibility, so you can adapt to evolving business needs, market demands, and global disruptions. Increase sales by optimizing inventory and delivering faster. Kibo order management software is developer-friendly and provides built-in CDN support.

similar_products.short_desc: NetSuite order management automates order management, returns, and exchanges, providing a flawless, flexible fulfillment strategy.
similar_products.features: NetSuite order management enables a buy anywhere, fulfill anywhere, return anywhere experience. Ensure efficient order management processes across all channels and fulfillment options throughout the order lifecycle, allowing businesses to deliver on customer expectations and drive profits. Automate the end-to-end order lifecycle, including order capture and validation, order release, shipment confirmation, customer communications, and settlement.

similar_products.short_desc: Meet the customer-first order management system, built on the #1 CRM to handle your busiest days.
similar_products.features: Deliver flexible, omni-channel order management anywhere in the world with Salesforce Order Management. Automate order fulfillment, payment capture, and invoices with supply chain workflows. Accurately view inventory with a single source of truth across all orders and records. Optimize for speed, cost, and other business priorities. Enable buy-online, pick up in store (BOPIS) and curbside pickup capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: Acumatica Order Mgmt lets you manage sales activities centrally, includes Sales Order Mgmt, Purchase Order Mgmt, and Requisition Mgmt.
similar_products.features: Acumatica Order Management lets you manage sales activities centrally. You can track prices, check available inventory, apply discounts, enter quotes, create shipments, and fulfill sales orders. Designed for modern technologies and built on a future-proof platform with an open architecture for rapid integrations, scalability, and ease of use, Acumatica delivers an unparalleled experience for users and customers alike.

similar_products.short_desc: Manufacturing ERP software for total visibility. Manage all the moving parts of your business - inventory, sales, and beyond.
similar_products.features:
Katana Manufacturing ERP gives you a live look at your business. Features include live inventory and manufacturing management, batch tracking for end-to-end traceability, a Shop Floor App for total floor-level control, open API, and a growing channel partner network. 

Real-time master planning features automate resource allocation based on prioritized sales orders and integrations with e-commerce, accounting, CRM, and reporting services to centralize all key business operations.

similar_products.short_desc: Complete Order Management software solutions, expert in-house support, over 30 years of EDI industry experience supporting your needs.
similar_products.features: Epicor EDI (formerly 1EDI Source) is a leading provider of Order Management software offering expert technical EDI support for over 30 years. Our flagship Order Management software is now even more powerful, supporting mid-size and enterprise organizational needs. Innovate and scale your supply chain with our EDI Order Management software bundled together with our EDI visibility portal, AS2 secure data encryption software and dedicated in-house support.

similar_products.short_desc: Simplify your purchasing by centralizing it onto 1 platform with the proper guardrails in place to ensure compliance and cost savings.
similar_products.features: Order simplifies buying for businesses by centralizing it onto one platform. With Order, all the products your company needs to operate can be found in one place with the approval and budgeting guardrails needed to ensure compliance. Placing recurring orders is as simple as one click with saved product lists, and saving on purchases hasn't been easier with Order's $4 billion in purchasing power and strategic sourcing that ensures you always pay the lowest prices for your products.

similar_products.short_desc: Make your Reps and B2B Customers enter their own orders! B2B Ordering Portal syncs with your QuickBooks. Fast and free phone setup.
similar_products.features: If you use *QuickBooks* and you are a *Distributor* or *Manufacturer* please click the orange button "Visit Website" to go to our real website (no email address required). Our easy B2B Ordering Portals allow your Reps and Wholesale Customers to safely do their own order entry, so you don't have to!

similar_products.short_desc: For retailers, wholesalers & multichannel brands trading over $1M. Brightpearl handles order management, fulfillment and much more.
similar_products.features:
For retailers trading over $1M, an advanced Retail Operating System designed to automate order processing and order fulfillment as well as handling inventory management, planning, reporting, warehouse management, accounting and shipping.
Our customers save on average 2 months per year by automating more workflows, like picking the most efficient fulfillment center for orders, splitting orders, automating dropshipping, fulfilling from multiple locations, creating purchase orders and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inventory Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inventory Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inventory Management software monitors inventory levels for optimal production and distribution of goods for wholesale or retail. These applications enable organizations to efficiently manage inventory as well as procurement and order fulfillment functions. Inventory Management solutions ensure accurate real-time inventory reporting and the ability to distribute this essential data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Inventory Management software is related to Inventory Control software and Supply Chain Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Logistics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Logistics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Logistics software automates warehousing, transportation management, shipping and other logistical functions, monitoring the flow of products from supplier to end user. These applications provide a wide variety of features including: inventory control, warehousing, purchasing and receiving, sales and shipping, barcode / RFID scanning and label printing. Logistics solutions typically offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting, and business reporting tools. Logistics software is related to Distribution software, RFID software, Shipping software, Trucking software and Warehouse Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Order Entry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Order Entry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Order Entry software automates the entry, processing and management of sales orders across multiple channels, including: phone, mail order, retail and internet purchases. They also offer category specific feature sets for specific retail sectors such as: cellular/wireless, electronics, furniture, appliance, gifts, pharmacy front stores and music stores. Order Entry applications typically offer real-time integration with inventory control, order management, payment processing, marketing and customer relationship management, helping to optimize costs and increase efficiency. Order Entry software is related to eCommerce software and Order Management software.

_source.short_desc: The Inventory, Orders, and All-Things-Operations Platform for Ecommerce Merchants.
_source.long_desc: For multichannel brands and high-volume marketplace sellers, Skubana provides unrivaled inventory, orders, purchasing, and shipping capabilities into one powerful cloud solution.  If you sell on Amazon, Shopify, Big Commerce, and/or through big-box retailers, Skubana will bring everything you need into one place.

category_features.name: CRM

category_features.definition: Helps users manage the maintenance of assets; offers reporting to identify areas for improvement.

category_features.definition: Integrated suite of industry-specific operations management applications (Supply Chain, HR, Project Management, Manufacturing, etc.)

category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.definition: Create, send, and track purchase orders and their statuses

category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.definition: Create, process, execute and manage suppliers invoices till the payment is made

category_features.definition: Create, send, and track purchase orders and their statuses

category_features.definition: Review, approve and cancel requests for goods/services to be purchased

category_features.definition: Negotiate best prices and choose the right vendor for various purchases

category_features.definition: The software will assign a tracking number associated to the order number to track the physical progress of the package in delivery.

related_products.short_desc: Use monday.com Work OS to centralize and manage your enterprise resource planning, improve teamwork, and get more done - in one place.
related_products.features: Use monday.com Work OS to simplify and centralize your enterprise resource planning, improve teamwork, and get more done. This customizable, no-code work and project management platform offers clever features such as time-saving automations, integrations with 40+ apps, easy-to-use boards that enable real-time collaboration, and visual dashboards to overview and track progress and results. Organize and manage budgets, resources, information, workflows, and more - all in one place.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite ERP lets you run your entire business on a single integrated cloud platform.
related_products.features: NetSuite cloud ERP provides the tools and insights companies need to operate effectively by operating core processes. Run your entire business with a single, integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, order processing, inventory management, production, supply chain, and warehouse operations. Get real-time visibility into financial and operational performance across your organization, whether you have a single location or multiple subsidiaries.

related_products.short_desc: Fishbowl's ERP solution was built from the ground up to handle any size inventory with grace and efficiency.
related_products.features: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) is the information system that drives manufacturing operations. Fishbowl's complete manufacturing and inventory management solution creates greater efficiency through cost savings, optimal utilization of resources, and streamlined reporting. Advanced work orders, material requirements planning (MRP), bills of materials and barcode scanning can be easily deployed on-premise or hosted in the cloud. Learn more about what Fishbowl can do for your business today.

related_products.short_desc: #1 free online ERP used by over 8 million businesses worldwide. Cloud, mobile and opens source editions available.
related_products.features: If you are looking for free online ERP, you've just found best free online ERP there is. Meet Bitrix24. Unlike other free open source ERP solutions that take hours to deploy and weeks to fully implement, Bitrix24 is ready to use in cloud in just 30 seconds. Don't worry, we also have on premise version of Bitrix24 with open source code access that you can install on your server as well.

related_products.short_desc: Cin7 is the affordable ERP for businesses that make, sell, and distribute products. Highly configurable to support all sales channels.
related_products.features: Cin7 is the affordable ERP for businesses that make, sell, and distribute products. Cin7 provides exceptional automations, workflows for all combinations of B2B and D2C sales channels, warehouses, shipping, and fulfillment. Cin7 can be implemented in weeks not months because you do not need to rip and replace QuickBooks or Xero. It's a highly configurable inventory and order management solution with built-in EDI and integrations to all the popular eCommerce platforms, marketplaces, and 3PLs.

related_products.short_desc: An open-source suite of integrated apps to manage CRM, PoS, Website, eCommerce, Sales, Accounting, Warehouse, HR, Marketing, and more.
related_products.features: Odoo is a completely customizable, fully integrated, all-in-one open-source software packed with hundreds of expertly designed business applications. Odoo offers up everything a business needs to run efficiently, such as CRM, Sales, Project, Manufacturing, Inventory, and Accounting, just to name a few. Regardless of size or budget, Odoo is tailor-made to help companies grow with their wide array of efficient, easy-to-use business solutions.

related_products.short_desc: Leading provider of best-in-class cloud ERP software.
related_products.features: Sage Intacct is a leading provider of best-in-class cloud ERP software. In use by more than 11,000 businesses from startups to public companies, Sage Intacct's applications help small and mid-sized organizations reach peak levels of performance by empowering finance professionals with deep functionality, real-time financial and operational insights, and the ability to automate critical processes.

related_products.short_desc: Reliable, real-time extended ERP software with lean and agile functionality developed especially for mid-market manufacturing companies
related_products.features: DELMIAworks (formerly IQMS) ERP software provides discrete and process manufacturers with a single solution to manage and monitor the entire manufacturing process. The comprehensive solution allows for a modular and scalable approach while eliminating data silos. DELMIAworks increases cross department visibility and efficiently with a complete real-time manufacturing, accounting, and supply chain system that includes Quality, EDI, WMS, MRP, production/process monitoring and more.

related_products.short_desc: Sage 100cloud is an ERP platform for growing and medium-sized distributors and manufacturers.
related_products.features: With more than 30 years as a market-leader, Sage 100cloud is among the most stable and feature-rich business management solutions for mid-sized manufacturers, distributors, and service businesses today. Built for security and compliance, Sage 100cloud is a trusted solution for managing complexities associated with growth. Thanks to its business objects framework, Web APIs, and Office 365 connectivity, Sage 100cloud can be easily customized to meet the unique needs of businesses.

related_products.short_desc: Discover SAP S/4HANA Cloud, a complete ERP system with embedded AI and machine learning.
related_products.features: SAP S/4HANA Cloud is a complete enterprise resource planning (ERP) system with built-in intelligent technologies, including AI, machine learning, and advanced analytics. It helps companies adopt new business models, manage business change at speed, orchestrate internal and external resources, and use the predictive power of AI. Benefit from tight, native integration between processes, industry depth, and a consistent in-memory data model.

similar_products.features: Katana is a manufacturing ERP that gives you a live look at your business. Enterprise resource planning features include live inventory and manufacturing management, batch tracking for end-to-end traceability, a Shop Floor App for total floor-level control, open API, and a growing channel partner network.

similar_products.short_desc: Use monday.com Work OS to centralize and manage your enterprise resource planning, improve teamwork, and get more done - in one place.
similar_products.features: Use monday.com Work OS to simplify and centralize your enterprise resource planning, improve teamwork, and get more done. This customizable, no-code work and project management platform offers clever features such as time-saving automations, integrations with 40+ apps, easy-to-use boards that enable real-time collaboration, and visual dashboards to overview and track progress and results. Organize and manage budgets, resources, information, workflows, and more - all in one place.

similar_products.short_desc: Discover SAP S/4HANA Cloud, a complete ERP system with embedded AI and machine learning.
similar_products.features: SAP S/4HANA Cloud is a complete enterprise resource planning (ERP) system with built-in intelligent technologies, including AI, machine learning, and advanced analytics. It helps companies adopt new business models, manage business change at speed, orchestrate internal and external resources, and use the predictive power of AI. Benefit from tight, native integration between processes, industry depth, and a consistent in-memory data model.

similar_products.short_desc: Merit for Life Science is a cloud-first D365 ERP solution intentionally tailored for biotech, pharma, and medical device organizations.
similar_products.features:
Merit for Life Science with Microsoft Dynamics 365 is a cloud-first ERP solution intentionally tailored
for fast-growing biotech, pharmaceutical, and medical device organizations.

It advances Dynamics 365 finance and operations functionality to help life science organizations drive increased process efficiencies, ready for and support rapid growth, and meet valuation expectations while maintaining FDA CFR 21 part 11, EMA Annex 11, and other country-specific regulatory compliance.

similar_products.short_desc: QT9 ERP is an easy-to-use, cloud-based ERP suite with FDA 21 CFR Part 11 electronic approvals. See a demo & start a Free Trial today!
similar_products.features: All-In-One ERP platform with unlimited scalability. QT9 ERP gives you a fully-integrated solution with real-time visibility. Includes 18+ modules for Bill of Materials, Accounting, Sales Orders, Shipping, Invoicing, Inventory Control, Purchasing, Job Scheduling, Shop Floor Manager & more. Digitally transform workflows with FDA 21 CFR Part 11 electronic signatures, electronic batch records, design history records, email reminders & dashboard views. Includes lot & serial number traceability.

similar_products.short_desc: User friendly, flexible, customizable, general-purpose ERP solution featuring robust toolsets which support a wide range of industries.
similar_products.features: Designed as a general-purpose ERP package, ALERE seeks to solve the day-to-day usability issues to allow organizations to run more efficiently. Infinitely flexible, with high levels of process automation and a user-friendly interface, ALERE provides a means to monitor an organization's workflows in real-time to provide the best possible data for decision making while minimizing redundant data entry. ALERE's manufacturing and inventory toolsets are second to none in the industry.

similar_products.short_desc: Kinetic is an end-to-end ERP solution for manufacturers that need real-time access to decision-making data anytime, anywhere.
similar_products.features: Kinetic is an end-to-end, cloud-based ERP solution developed to fit the specific needs of manufacturers in Aerospace/Defense, Automotive, Discrete, Electronics/High Tech, Fabricated Metals, Furniture/Fixtures, Industrial Machinery, Medical Device, Metal Service Centers and Rubber/Plastics industries. Equipped with advanced BI and analytic tools, Kinetic may improve operations, reduce costs, increase sales and margins, and improve customer service.

similar_products.short_desc: Modern inventory management and traceability ERP software with lot track/trace, costing, orders, POs, reports and integrations.
similar_products.features: Modern & easy to use inventory management and traceability ERP that enables your team to perform batch and lot track/trace, inventory control, formula/recipe management, unit and batch costing, customer orders & supplier purchasing, putting new  material into service, and moving your data between systems such as Quickbooks, Sage Intacct, Amazon Seller Central, Shopify and over 2,000 third-party platforms. B2B ordering portal. Runs on any internet-connected device - including tablets and phones.

similar_products.short_desc: Full-featured, customizable, cloud-based ERP built to handle your daily operations with integrations to Shopify, QBO and more.
similar_products.features: Paragon is a full-featured, cloud ERP that handles your daily operations from order and inventory management, to advanced supply chain, manufacturing and reporting. Connect your ecommerce and accounting operations with integrations to Shopify, QuickBooks Online and more. Paragon has all the features and functionality you expect from a custom solution for large and complex enterprises. ERP software designed for people, not users.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Distribution software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Distribution tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Distribution software manages processes including inventory tracking and warehousing. These applications increase efficiency and reduce costs by allowing key data to be easily shared throughout an enterprise. Distribution solutions typically provide inventory controls and tracking as well as channel monitoring features. Distribution software often provides integration for sales, purchase orders and pricing information, vendor and customer contact information along with accounting and business reporting tools. Distribution software is related to Logistics software, Shipping software and Warehouse Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inventory Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inventory Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inventory Management software monitors inventory levels for optimal production and distribution of goods for wholesale or retail. These applications enable organizations to efficiently manage inventory as well as procurement and order fulfillment functions. Inventory Management solutions ensure accurate real-time inventory reporting and the ability to distribute this essential data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Inventory Management software is related to Inventory Control software and Supply Chain Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Logistics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Logistics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Logistics software automates warehousing, transportation management, shipping and other logistical functions, monitoring the flow of products from supplier to end user. These applications provide a wide variety of features including: inventory control, warehousing, purchasing and receiving, sales and shipping, barcode / RFID scanning and label printing. Logistics solutions typically offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting, and business reporting tools. Logistics software is related to Distribution software, RFID software, Shipping software, Trucking software and Warehouse Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Material Requirements Planning (MRP) software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of MRP tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Material Requirements Planning (MRP) software manages material requirements for manufacturing processes. These applications are also known as Manufacturing Resources Planning (MRP II) systems. MRP software enables more efficient business process management for production planning and inventory control, ensuring that materials are readily available to meet production demands. MRP software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software, Manufacturing Execution Systems and Production Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Supply Chain Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Supply Chain Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Supply Chain Management software automates the flow of processes from raw materials through to delivery of finished goods to the consumer. These applications allow for organization-wide order processing, transportation and warehouse management along with planning and forecasting tools. Supply Chain Management software provides for efficient operation through the distribution and synchronization of this key data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Supply Chain Management software is related to Inventory Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Warehouse Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Warehouse Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Warehouse Management software enables the movement, tracking and storage of materials throughout the warehouse. These applications increase efficiency and reduce costs by allowing key data to be easily shared throughout an enterprise. Warehouse Management solutions typically provide inventory controls and tracking as well as procurement management and channel monitoring features. They also offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting and business reporting tools. Warehouse Management software is related to Distribution software and Logistics software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.
